data.name: BUDDHA GO
data.detailed_description:
BUDDHA GO is a relaxing racing game to be enjoyed with a Zen.
There is no accel, no brake, no items, and no nitro.
Player controls the buddha only with the left stick (the arrow keys can also be used). The extreme simplicity and comfort of the controls will have players looping around the course over and over again.
The game is a hot 1-on-1 battle and a time attack game to nirvana.
